description.text: A death druid adds the following spells to her druid spell list at the given spell levels: 0--grave words; 1st--sanctify corpse; 2nd--calm spirit, false life, ghostbane dirge, spiritual weapon; 3rd--speak with dead; 4th--speak with haunt, spiritual ally; 5th--breath of life, call spirit, mass ghostbane dirge; 6th--circle of death, undeath to death.
